bibl.title: The Elephant and its Keepers. A Postscript on P. Mich. inv. 4290.
bibl.note: Ed.: Traianos GAGOS, Three Short Byzantine Papyri from the Michigan Collection, ZPE 79 (1989) pp. 273-275 and pl. VII b. - Perhaps the Michigan picture is a record of someone's pleasure in the sight of a performing elephant and its exotic masters.
WHITEHOUSE Helen, The Elephant and its Keepers. A Postscript on P. Mich. inv. 4290.
